lead_paragraph: Gas leak that sickened some Los Angeles residents and forced thousands from their homes was largest known release of climate-changing methane in United States history, scientists reported Thursday.

headline.print_headline: California: Methane Leak Was a Record For the U.S.
headline.main: California: Methane Leak Was a Record for the U.S.

snippet: Gas leak that sickened some Los Angeles residents and forced thousands from their homes was largest known release of climate-changing methane in United States history, scientists reported Thursday.
